product_description: Precaution: 1. Don't use whitehead extractor tool every day. 2. Do not use the blackhead remover kit on acne if they are not ripe enough. 3. Use medical alcohol to clean pore cleaner tool after and before use. 4. Keep it away from children under the age of 6. For small children over the age of 6, Please use it with the help of an adult. Using pimple needle tool steps: 1. Prepare required tools: acne kit, anti-inflammatory water,medical grade alcohol and cotton swab. 2. Open pores: wash face with warm water or place warm, Then use facial steamer or warm towel over face for 2-3 minutes. 3. Select pore vacuum: Circle loop for large or inflamed breakouts, thin needle tip for cleaning smaller pores, extracting blemishes, etc. 4.Using distilled or anti-inflammatory water to clean the area of acne after squeezing. 5. Wash hands and clean extractors: wash hands thoroughly with soap and warm water, then use medical grade alcohol and cotton swab to clean all acne kit tools. name: Oars + Alps Anti Everything Pads & Blackhead Remover, Facial Cleanser & Exfoliator with 10% Glycolic & Salicylic Acids for All Skin Types, Exfoliant Hydrates Skin & Reduces Blackheds, Wrinkles,28 ct
short_description: DAILY EXFOLIATING PADS: Saturated with 10% Glycolic Acid and 0.5% of Salicylic Acid, these pads help clear your complexion, reduce the buildup of dead skin, and leave your face feeling clean and smooth.

FIGHT BREAKOUTS, BLACKHEADS AND INGROWN HAIRS: By reducing the buildup of dead skin cells on your face through gentle exfoliation, these pads help fight the common cause of breakouts, blackheads and ingrown hairs. Meanwhile, they help minimize the appearance of pores.

REDUCE THE APPEARANCE OF WRINKLES AND DARK SPOTS: With consistent use over time, these pads also help reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and hyperpigmentation (i.e. dark spots) by removing the layer of skin that makes it appear dull.

GLYCOLIC AND SALICYLIC ACIDS: Paired with Tea Tree Oil, these gentle exfoliants help soothe skin and combat redness from pollution and other environmental factors. We also include Willowbark Extract to condition your skin and minimize dryness and peeling.
PREMIUM, GOOD-FOR-YOU INGREDIENTS: Vegan, cruelty-free and dermatologist-tested. We never use alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates aluminum or talc.
product_description: You Have: 1) Breakouts or blackheads 2) Razor bumps or ingrown hairs 3) Fine lines or wrinkles 4) Hyperpigmentation (i.e. dark spots) You Need: Our Anti-Everything Pads to help protect you from, well, everything. These pads are saturated with 10% Glycolic Acid and 0.5% of Salicylic Acid, two ingredients that are known to help clear your complexion, reduce the buildup of dead skin, and leave your face feeling clean and smooth. What It Does: Glycolic Acid and Salicylic Acid are gentle exfoliants that remove dead skin cells from the surface of your skin. This reduces the buildup that can cause breakouts, blackheads and ingrown hairs and helps minimize the appearance of pores. Over time, it also reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and hyperpigmentation by removing the layer of skin that makes it appear dull. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates and Gluten. Vegan and Animal Cruelty-free.
